Text: Virus Free and Full application! Tested and working with Sony Ericsson Xperia x10 mini pro. It's supposed to work on all Android phones. Give feedback if it does or doesn't work on the type of Android device tested on plz.
Works perfectly on HTC Desire, thanks!
How do i install this to my Nexus S 4G ( sorry im a newbie)

Imaaqeex3 at 2011-08-07 20:13 CET: 
How do i install this to my Nexus S 4G ( sorry im a newbie)

1. Tap the applications launcher
2. Scroll over and tap Settings
3. In the settings menu, scroll down and tap Language & keyboard
4. Tap on Input method
5. Find the name of the keyboard you want to activate, and tap on it (SlideIt)
Your new keyboard is now active! If you want to test it to make sure it is activated, just press the Search key, and your keyboard will pop up.
HOPE THAT HELPS!
I Meant as in what folder do i copy the file too

@Imaaqeex3 
You are supposed to install the .apk file using the application manager on the phone. copy the file into memory card where you will remember where the file is then use the application installer to search for it and install
how do i install this to my xperia?

sadahzinia at 2011-08-23 20:25 CET: 
how do i install this to my xperia? 

Go to Menu, Select Applications, Look for file calles sk40 and select install. Search for installed app in menu and follow instructions.
